sentences.en: Ask: In damp summer, how to maintain makeup appearance abiding?
sentences.cn: 问: 在潮湿的夏季, 如何保持妆容持久?

sentences.en: By and large, these people are peace-loving, law-abiding citizens.
sentences.cn: 大体上，这些人都是热爱和平、遵纪守法的公民。

sentences.en: Gun ownership by law-abiding people was not a problem.
sentences.cn: 让守法的人持有枪械并不会惹麻烦。

sentences.en: He had an abiding love of the English countryside.
sentences.cn: 他永远热爱英国的乡村.

sentences.en: He has a genuine and abiding love of the craft.
sentences.cn: 他对这门手艺有着真挚持久的热爱。

sentences.en: His abiding passion was ocean racing, at which he scored many successes.
sentences.cn: 他一直酷爱海上赛艇，并多次在比赛中获胜。

sentences.en: I'm tired of your abiding complaints.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你没完没了的抱怨.

sentences.en: If he had one abiding trait, it was his desire of astonishing people.
sentences.cn: 如果说他有什么经常性的癖好的话, 那就是他老想惹人吃惊.

sentences.en: Its abiding place was in all things fitted to it.
sentences.cn: 饥饿居住在一切适合于它居住的东西上.

sentences.en: Let no man underrate our energies, our potentialities and our abiding power for good.
sentences.cn: 我们决不会让人低估我们除恶向善的活力 、 潜能和力量.

sentences.en: One of my abiding memories of him is of his singing to a small private party.
sentences.cn: 我对他难以忘怀的一幕是他在一次小型私人派对上献歌的情景。

sentences.en: Phil has a deep and abiding love for his family.
sentences.cn: 菲尔对家人怀有深厚不渝的爱。

sentences.en: The place had also a more abiding defect.
sentences.cn: 这块地方还有一种更是由来已久的不良之风.

sentences.en: The place had also a more abiding effect; that was, it drank hard.
sentences.cn: 这块地方还有一种更由来已久的风气, 那就是, 喝酒喝得很凶.

sentences.en: There was a rapturous ring of silence abiding perfectly.
sentences.cn: 有夺人心魄的寂静铃声完美地永存.

sentences.en: This faith is the abiding creed of our fathers.
sentences.cn: 这信念是我们祖先的永久的信念.

words.tran_cn: 遵守；停留；忍受（abide的过去分词）
遵守；容忍；继续存在（abide的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 持久的，永久的，不变的，由来已久的
trans.tran_en: an abiding feeling or belief continues for a long time and is not likely to change

trans.tran_cn: 容忍(abide的现在分词)，遵守，继续存在
